body.name: Android Tablet PC, 10.1" Touch Screen, Quad-Core Processor, 32GB ROM 2MP+8MP Dual Camera, WiFi Bluetooth, 512GB Expand, IPS Full HD Display, 6000mAh Battery Powerful Performance Tablet.
features: 【Android 11.0 & High Performance CPU】 ZZB ZB10 tablet is equipped with high performance CPU Quad-core, adopting the Android 11.0 system with AI , all functions have been strengthened to next level, and can be operated even more swiftly. And with RAM: 2GB ROM: 32GB, you can feel the smooth operation. Perfect for watching videos, learning tools, and reading e-books.

【IPS Display & Dual Camera】 10.1in HD tablet equipped with high resolutionof 10.1-inch 1280*800 IPS display. Sizing up to 10.1 inches, you get more space, best choice for movie and video viewing and site browsing. In addition, there is a "reading mode" to reduce harmful light to the eyes so you get to enjoy a comfortable night reading. It has dual cameras (8 megapixels on the rear and 2 megapixels on the front) for taking amazing photos and video chatting.

【512gb Memory & Large Capacity Battery】 The Android 11 tablet comes with 32GB of built-in storage and up to 512GB of expandable microSD card storage for even more space. In addition, the built-in 6000mah battery can be used for a long time. You can download many movies, e-books and music. A single charge of the battery can last up to 12 hours which makes it an attractive tablet.

【GMS Certification Complete 】 Tablet With certification of Google Mobile Service (GMS) and pre-installed Google Play supports Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Tiktok, Line, Instagram and other trendy social apps, Support Microsoft Office Software.

【Ideal Choice For Gift & Rest Assured】 This Google tablet has excellent performance, stylish appearance, and elegant packaging, making it the perfect choice for Christmas, Valentine's Day, birthday, and bar mitzvahs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZB10 10.1 inch tablet High quality tablet ZZB is a specialist tablet manufacturer, We make quality tablets. our products ZB10 10.1 inch tablet is a high quality tablet, due to High Performance it is suitable for Kinds of Scenarios, Such as Reading, Photograph, videos, Music, Watch a Movie, Play a Game, or Surf the Internet. It makes your day joyful and convenient. It will be a good choice for the family entertainment and also can be a good gift to friends.

portable entertainment Tablets Details ZZB ZB10 10" HD display tablet PC, USB Type C Port, 32 storage and up to 512 GB with microSD card + 2 GB RAM, Keep all your favorite music, photos or videos, plays videos more smoothly. and enables an impressive gaming and multimedia experience. 6000mAH battery tablet With up to 12 hours on a full charge, you can create and edit all day, plus enjoy continuous browsing and streaming. HD Display tablet You will always enjoy crisp, vibrant images whether you are watching movies, playing games with your kids or catching up on the latest live broadcast.

10.1 inch android tablet 10.1 inch HD Display android tablet ZB10 Android Tablet with 10'' 1280*800 HD Display, Enjoy brilliant colors, crisp text, vivid video viewing when you watch videos or play games.

Powerful camera function ZB10 tablet has a powerful camera function. It is equipped with dual cameras, 2MP pixels in the front and 8MP in the rear. Let you in the entertainment at the same time can also record the wonderful every moment.

Multi-function tablet Meets Reading, Photograph, videos, Music, etc. Suitable for Most Life Scenarios This 10.1" Tablet Google Mobile Service (GMS) has been certified, and pre-installed Google Play supports Facebook to ensure consistent quality,reliability, and maximize privacy protection for secure browsing and communications. Pre-installed Google play store enables you to download hundreds of thousands of free Android games, as well as document processing apps, e-mail apps and business purpose apps. Ideal for Daily Use The 10IN tablet computer uses a 1280*800 full HD IPS display with vivid colors and improved viewing angle, so you can watch your favorite movies and shows without missing a detail. Immerse yourself in reading with read mode which reduces eyestrain. Great device for remote learning that won't break the bank The GMS Certified latest Android Tablet, with basic Google apps already on and without bloatware. Get rid of unexpected ads and download apps from Google Play.

You can also buy ZZB tablet case and tablet electric meninges to fully protect your tablet and facilitate your daily use. Soft PU leather can absorb shock and scratches and prevent water and dirt from penetrating. Even if you drop it, it will protect the tablet ZB10. Can tolerate long time use. Full protection Soft PU leather can absorb shock and scratches and prevent water and dirt from penetrating. Even if you drop it, it will protect the tablet ZB10. Can tolerate long time use. Lightweight and portable but protect your device in all aspects. Easy access to all the controls and features; Perfect cutouts for speakers, camera and other ports. ZZB screen protector can effectively protect screen from accidental scratches by keys, knife or other hard objects in daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy for children to navigate.
reviews.reviewText: It was a great buy for my grandchildren. Although they intermittently stopped working, they were reset and it fixed the issue. I called my daughter to ask how they were operating now and she said one is working ok but the other keeps freezing up and will not reset. She also said both chargers weren’t not functional. Overall so far it seems to have been a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Utter trash. Slow; bad screen; extremely easy to break it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use as a kitchen tool to display recipes and record new ones. It is extremely slow; I dropped it 3 feet and the entire back popped off; the battery life is not great (if that's why you're buying it); the screen is extremely low quality (low color gamut, lots of light bleed, poor backlighting) and the touch responsiveness is EXTREMELY slow. Not only does it take forever to respond to touches, the animations on screen take forever to run. It's like using a computer that has a virus on it---permanently.

reviews.reviewerName: It's slow loading but good deal
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a lil slow loading but it's ok

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to connect to public wifi (TIP)
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a "Family" tablet so my kids can use it during trips or watching a show here and there. It is a little slow on touch recognition but it was okay as it was ment for the kids mainly. It doesn't Inpact gameplay as far as I can tell (plants vs zombies and other small games). The main issue I had is when connecting to public wifi which was very frustrating. With my phone I could click a notification that would allow me to accept the terms and conditions of that public network such as hotels, fast food places etc. But the notification was not on this tablet. Which I thought it would be okay I can usually get it if I search up a news website like abc, fox or something very basic. Still did not work with this tablet. I looked for hours online and came across THIS TIP of typing a url that doesn't have an http address. Sort of what I did before but for my table if you type "example.com" it worked to bring up the terms and conditions of public wifi. I hoped this helped someone!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tablet for myself believe it or not I've never had a tablet in my life, so I decide to why not the price was right even though the name I wasn't familiar with it didn't matter I figured why not give it a try so I received a tablet turned it on everything's working well the only problem I have with this is that when you use a pen with the end it touches the screen if you're touching letters or numbers sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't also you have to be careful make sure you have your Wi-Fi and it's secure because for some reason this company has their own which I find it odd that bothered me a lot they shouldn't but it's there so just be advised of that. I also downloaded like prime and some other apps Google Chrome everything seems to be working well the only thing I have problem with is like I said sometimes you really have to touch the screen with your finger instead of with the pen with the plastic end for the screen, oh and since I have Xfinity Wi-Fi I have the app itself on my phone every time I turn on the Wi-Fi and it's in my name it's locked it gives me two different names it'll say the name of the product or it'll say another name which is frustrating because usually when you have anything like your laptop or your phone and it's assigned to your Xfinity Wi-Fi with a code anytime you log into it it should come up the same so for example I have my television that's Wi-Fi and it's a TLC Roku so anytime we log on to that and we go on it it shows on my Xfinity but with this tablet it's always showing either the product itself or it will say and I'll tell you right now cuz I'm going to look at my phone so basically the MAC address keeps changing so one minute it will tell you the device name which is Sannuo K708 or it will log on on my private Wi-Fi as unknown and it won't even say it's a tablet it would say it's either let me spell it Misc Device. I believe this shouldn't be happening because like I said an emphasize that if you have Xfinity Wi-Fi and you have a user's name password and you put it on the tablet it's just show up the name of the tablet all the time the same one but nope every time it's a different address and I have to go in and forget that device and then it'll save the name the one I put up on top case k708 or like I said a miscellaneous it's it's aggravating really I think it should just be easy to just log in and turn on your Wi-Fi and Xfinity app shouldn't be constantly notifying you that this device just logged in when it belongs to me and it's on my in my name so there's a problem with this they need to fix it there's too much Mac address this shouldn't be that many and also again they have their own Wi-Fi so I like it the Price is Right but I don't like the fact that one they have too many Mac addresses to they have their own Wi-Fi so make sure if you're going to purchase this to have your own Wi-Fi password and make sure it's locked okay so nobody can get in there and still your information okay aside from that I have installed Norton virus and it works well with the tablets everything works well I just have issues with private privacy to be more exact I feel as though this company has too many Mac addresses and that's not good but aside from that it's working good for the exception of the buttons it's not too bad but I mean I've done emailing from here but no problem I've even did some searching no problem I've even watched a movie on here the clarity was great the sound was good so all for the price you getting for it and the size is good and like I mentioned there the only little problems there is what I mentioned aside from that I recommended just be careful and just follow what I said and you won't you shouldn't have a problem if anything comes up trust and believe me I will be back to write a review another one. But for now everything is working fine for the exception of what I mentioned so yeah I do recommend this but be cautious okay.

reviews.reviewTitle: This tablet does not have GPS
reviews.reviewText: From the description:"...With GPS capability, you can download offline map on the tablet and navigate through the built-in GPS sensor..."False advertisement.
Faut pas être trop pressé..assez lent!Mieux de payer plus chère !
